home_big_title: A Simple Platform for Online Petitions

petition_form.user_info_head_note: A valid email is required in order to verify your petition.
petition_form.title: Petition Title
petition_form.create_petition_success: Your petition has been created successfully
petition_form.create_petition_fail_head: An error happened while creating your petition
petition_form.image_type_not_allowed: This image type is not allowed
petition_form.only_limited_tags: You can choose maximum tags of
petition_form.tags_invalid: The system has detected that you have selected invalid tags.
petition_form.img_data_invalid: The system has detected that the image is corrupted.
petition_form.country_invalid: The system has detected that you have selected an invalid country.
petition_form.email_invalid: Your email is invalid. Please remember that you will need to verify your email in order to activate your petition.
petition_form.empty_fields_msg: There are empty fields. make sure that the title and the body of the petitions are greater than 12 characters.
petition_form.petition_created_but_email_not_sent: Your petition has been created successfully. But our system cannot send you an email in order to verify your petition. Please contact us.
petition_form.verification_email_msg: In order to verify your petition, please copy the verification code and paste it into our website
petition_form.verification_process_done: Valid Verification Code. Your petition has been verified successfully.

petition_view.petition_status_victory_end: This petition has ended with victory. Thank you.
petition_view.petition_status_fail_end: This petition ended with failure. Good luck next time.
petition_view.waiting_verify: This petition is waiting for approval.
petition_view.check_email_to_verify_petition: Please check your email to verify your petition.
petition_view.no_one_signed_note: No one signed yet. Be the first one.

sign_form.name: Name
sign_form.disclaimer: By signing this petition, I consent to show my name on the list of signatures and agree to the Privacy Policy on this site.
sign_form.sign_done: You have signed this petition. Thank you.
sign_form.signed_before: You have signed this petition before. Thank you.
sign_form.email_invalid: Your email is invalid. Please remember that you will need to verify your email in order to activate your signature.
sign_form.sign_done_but_email_not_sent: Your signature has been registered successfully. But our system cannot send you an email in order to verify your signature. Please contact us.
sign_form.verification_email_msg: In order to verify your signature on the petition, please copy the verification code and paste it into our website
sign_form.created_but_email_not_sent: Your signature has been created successfully. But our system cannot send you an email in order to verify your signature. Please contact us.
sign_form.check_email_to_verify: Please check your email in order to verify your signature.
sign_form.waiting_verify: This signature is waiting for approval.
sign_form.verification_process_done: Valid Verification Code. Your signature has been verified successfully.

you_will_be_redirected_in: You will be redirected to the destination page in
